ai.engine.kepoj.entities

Class Neuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.engine.kepoj.entities.Neuron
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Neuron
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The fundamental unit of NeuralNetwork class. Each instance has a List of weights that can be resized in the DynamicLayer class or anywhere else. The bias neuron is moved to a variable that modifying separately from the list of weights.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    NeuralNetwork, Serialized Form

      Contains the output of the neuron before activation (rawOutput) and after (output)

      Contains the output of the neuron before activation (rawOutput) and after (output)
      ArrayList<Double> weights
      Resizable list of the neuron weights.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Neuron

        public Neuron(int weightsCount,
              ActivationFunction activationFunc)
        Creates a neuron object with randomly generated weights and bias
        Parameters:
        weightsCount - count of input connections to the neuron, usually is neurons count in the previous layer.
        activationFunc - activation function

      • Neuron

        public Neuron(double[] weights,
              double bias,
              ActivationFunction activationFunc)
        Creates a neuron object with specific weights and bias values
        Parameters:
        weights - weights array
        bias - weight for bias-neuron
        activationFunc - activation function

    • Method Detail

      • random

        public static double random()
        Generates a random number for neuron weights
        Returns:
        random number between -1 and 1

      • excite

        public double excite(double[] inputData)
        Processes the input by multiplying each input value by the corresponding weight and summing it. The sum is written to Neuron::rawOutput, after that the sum is activated by activation function and writes to the Neuron::output variable.
        Parameters:
        inputData - input values for neuron
        Returns:
        activated sum
        Since:
        1.0

      • setWeight

        @Deprecated
public void setWeight(int index,
                                  double value)
        Deprecated. 

      • setError

        public void setError(double error)
        Sets the neuron's error and multiplies it by the derivative of the neuron output
        Parameters:
        error - value of the neuron's error without multiplying by the derivative of the output
        Since:
        1.1
